titleStmt.title: At the blew ball in Great Knight-rider street, by doctors commons, is sold that famous power, called, Arcanum Magnum, formerly prepared by that learned River[?], physician-regent to the French king, and approved by most persons of quality in Christendom, for preserving the face; ...

At the blew ball in Great Knight-rider street, by doctors commons, is sold that famous power, called, Arcanum Magnum, formerly prepared by that learned River[?], physician-regent to the French king, and approved by most persons of quality in Christendom, for preserving the face; ...

notesStmt.note: Title is taken from first lines of text.
At end: "I am a physician and give my advice gratis in all distempers."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
